name: Timmie
description:
Triggers automatically once per Round: This card gains 1 Pigeon.
When this card gains 3 Pigeons, discard this card, then draw 1 card and create Omni Element ×1.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Triggers automatically once per Round:</color> This card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 Pigeon</color>.\nWhen this card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>3 Pigeons</color>, discard this card, then draw 1 card and create $[K411] ×1.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Triggers automatically once per Round:</color> This card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 Pigeon</color>.\nWhen this card gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>3 Pigeons</color>, discard this card, then draw 1 card and create <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> ×1.
storytext: "Will pigeons that have flown away come back?"
source: Reward for accepting Timmie's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
